    Class
    Description
    AbandonedShipCardASCIIFormatter
    The AbandonedShipCardASCIIFormatter class provides functionality to format an AbandonedShipCard as an ASCII art representation.
    AbandonedStationCardASCIIFormatter
    The AbandonedStationCardASCIIFormatter class provides functionality to format an AbandonedStationCard into an ASCII art representation that fits within a 48-character wide and 15-line high textual display.
    EpidemicCardASCIIFormatter
    Formats an EpidemicCard into a multi-line ASCII string representation.

    Formats a SlaversCard into a multi-line ASCII string representation with more detailed ASCII art.

    Formats a SmugglersCard into a multi-line ASCII string representation with enhanced graphics.

    Formats a StellarSpaceDustCard into a multi-line ASCII string representation with enhanced graphics.

    WarZoneCardASCIIFormatter
    Formats a WarZoneCard into a multi-line ASCII string representation with enhanced graphics, detailing its penalties.
